caption:
### Image 1:
"A possibly plastic container-type object with green coloring and a rectangular shape. Appears to have a lid or cap on top. Likely used for storing household items. Seen on a countertop near other cleaning supplies."

### Image 2:
"A ceramic mug with pink coloring and a cylindrical shape. Has a handle and a flat base. Made for holding beverages. Found on a windowsill next to a plant."
